SalvageQuest.name: Salvaging an artifact
SalvageQuest.description: Researchers of [location1] have picked up an infrasonic signal highly similar to those emitted by alien artifacts previously discovered on Europa. Investigate the signal and retrieve the potential artifact.
SalvageQuest.successmessage: The artifact has been succesfully retrieved

message.text: The artifact is now on board. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.
